I agree, Wendy's games are usually top notch. This ones a pain in the arse though. Although it is virus free, it keeps on minimising itself to the task bar. Unplayable because of this. I see others having the same problem. I use Win7.

Just got it working. You have to make sure you have no web browser running at the same time. If it won't go to full screen then start your web browser, then start the game. When game goes down to the taskbar, just close your web browser then click on the game icon on the taskbar. Voila, playable game. Thanks Wendy.
